script.name: plugin.diplomacy.t.steal
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.diplomacy'
if not $a.station -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !agent.cmd.recall : Diplomat=$a.agent Tasks=null return null end
* determine success chance $success.rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 $failure.rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 @ $aRisk = [THIS] -> call script plugin.diplomacy.lib.stealrisk : Ware=$a.ware Risk Level=$a.risk $min.risk = $aRisk[0] $max.risk = $aRisk[1] $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 $steal.amt = linear interpolation: x1=$min.risk, x2=$max.risk, y1=0, y2=100, value=$rnd
$owner = $a.station -> get owner race @ $cost = [THIS] -> call script plugin.diplomacy.m.trade : Agent=$a.agent Event=[MEvent.Influence] Data=null $cost = get influence bonus decrease: race=$owner amount=$cost decrease influence of Player -> $owner amount=$cost $a.agent ->inc agent statistic: id='egosoft.default.influence.used' amount=$cost $a.agent ->inc agent statistic: id='egosoft.default.missions.diplomat' amount=1
@ if not [THIS] -> call script !agent.move : Diplomat=$a.agent Target Station=$a.station @ = [THIS] -> call script !agent.cmd.recall : Diplomat=$a.agent Tasks=null return null end
@ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.agent.initial.setup : Diplomat=$a.agent Menu Text=1104560 Percent Delay=1000
skip if $a.station -> exists return null
$sector = $a.station -> get sector $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=20, $a.ware, null, null, null, null @ skip if [THIS] -> call script plugin.diplomacy.lib.work : Agent=$a.agent Percent Delay=1500 Text=$read.text return null
if $a.risk == 'verylow' $success = 80 else if $a.risk == 'low' $success = 60 else if $a.risk == 'average' $success = 50 else if $a.risk == 'high' $success = 40 else if $a.risk == 'veryhigh' $success = 30 end
$current.time = playing time $last.steal = $a.station -> get local variable: name='last.steal' if $last.steal AND ( $last.steal + 3600 ) > $current.time $success.rnd = $success.rnd - 15 $failure.rnd = $failure.rnd - 15 else if $last.steal AND ( $last.steal + 7200 ) > $current.time $success.rnd = $success.rnd - 10 $failure.rnd = $failure.rnd - 10 end $a.station ->set local variable: name='last.steal' value=$current.time
$station.amt = $a.station -> get amount of ware $a.ware in cargo bay $hq = get player HQ skip if $hq -> exists $hq = $a.agent -> get homebase $hq.free = $hq -> get free amount of ware $a.ware in cargo bay $steal.amt = get minimum, $steal.amt, $station.amt, $hq.free, null, null
if $success.rnd <= $success if not $hq -> trades with ware $a.ware $hq ->add product to factory or dock: $a.ware $hq ->change ware to storage: ware=$a.ware end $negate = - $steal.amt $moved = $a.station -> add $negate units of $a.ware if $moved $steal.amt = - $moved $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=30, $a.agent, $steal.amt, $a.ware, $a.station, null send incoming message $read.text to player: type:[Log.Event], display it=[TRUE] = $hq -> add $steal.amt units of $a.ware end else $station.owner = $a.station -> get owner race $text = create new array, arguments=$page.id, 29, null, null, null $args = create new array, arguments=$a.ware, $a.station, null, null, null
* killed if $failure.rnd <= 20 $station.owneradd notoriety: race=Player value=-20 @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.agent.caught : Agent=$a.agent Killed?=[TRUE] Message Text=$text Message Args=$args * caught else if $failure.rnd <= 60 $station.owneradd notoriety: race=Player value=-20 @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.agent.caught : Agent=$a.agent Killed?=[FALSE] Message Text=$text Message Args=$args * failed else $station.owneradd notoriety: race=Player value=-5 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=31, $a.agent, $a.ware, $a.station, null, null send incoming message $read.text to player: type:[Log.Event], display it=[TRUE] end end return null

line.text: add product to factory or dock:
